name: Seeds of Life (Emmanuel Barreau)
description:
Overview

Game made for the Aera of Effect Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Signs of Life".

In Seeds of Life, you have to grow a planet using seeds. While growing, plants will create new surfaces for you to cultivate. Be warned though, for if you don't water your plants properly (too few or too much water), they will struggle to grow.

The more a plant grow, the more it consumes water. It is a challenge that will reward  you with new seeds if you do a good job, meaning you can expend your planet even more.

I hope you will enjoy Seeds of Life as I enjoyed making it. Stay tuned for further updates !

Controls:

Mouse grab'n'drag to rotate the planet
Mouse click for other actions.

Credits:

Game entirely made by Emmanuel BARREAU (@Kaihyo) in 48h.
Watering can and seeds icon : Flaticon.com
SFX: Zapsplat.com
